name: Turn It Off
description:
The aim of the game is to collect the key and leave the room, before time runs out.

Source at: https://github.com/emelent/wgj-82

Sound Effects: https://freesound.org

Music: https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle

Controls:

Move                     - WASD 

Press Remote   - Left Mouse Click

Jump                      - Right Mouse Click / Left Shift

Restart                 - Restart Level

Main Menu        - Escape

Here's a link to an updated version. http://turn-it-off-update.surge.sh
